versions.description: Everything works, no bugs and no DB implementation yet.
implemented basic Pop-Ups aswell as chapter-exporting

Better looks, dark mode, and QSS for every os under 11, and switched graphics package to PySide6.
 The downloading and processing of images has also gotten faster to accommodate for older machines.
Benefits from 1.7 without the bugs. And is made release-ready. New feature from 1.7 is the search.
Added small bugfixes and minor features for version 1.6.2.

Made the application much more enjoyable than 1.6.3.

Features include: 
-Reduced load times by more than 100%
-Smooth scrolling
-7 new providers
-Provider switching made easier than ever

!!NONPRODUCTION!!
Implemented many nice to have features and styling options, Lazy Loading is planned to be in the Full Release.
